name: ダンジョンアーティファクト
name_original: ダンジョンアーティファクト
description:
Roguelike Deckbuilder


Repeatedly acquire and delete cards to strengthen your deck power and fight back against enemy automata.
Over 300 different cards, each with its own unique effect, can be combined to create endless strategies.

Card Categories


This title features four different card categories.

Active Card
It is a basic card whose effect is applied immediately upon use.

Permanent Card
It has the effect of static.

Counter Card
It can be activated at any time, including the opponent's turn. It has a special effect that allows you to interfere with your opponent's actions.

Artifact Card
It is a powerful card that is always effective if you have it.

Character


You can start the game by choosing one of two characters, "Lydia" and "Smyrna".
Each character has its own features and different cards that can be acquired, allowing you to play with a completely different strategy.

Story


An artifact with a power that cannot be explained by current technology.
To retrieve the artifact, Lydia and Smyrna enter a dungeon to discover the secrets of the dungeon...

Streaming, Video Creation
